name: Tuxedo, Watch out for the rock!
name_original: Tuxedo, Watch out for the rock!
description:
Texudo, watch out for the rock! 

This is a simple 2D game made at Ludum Dare 47 game Jam.

This is my first game jam and the first game i ever made. It's far to be the best indie game, but i'm happy with the result and proud with myself becasuse i finally finished a project! Any feedbacks will be welcome, but please, be polite :)

HOW TO PLAY

WASD ou Arrow keys to move

Space to use your super hiper mega power

Esc to pause

The games was designed to be played at 1366 x 786. If its to big for your screen, reduce browser zoom or download it.

You can find the source project on the link bellow. There are no comments on the code (i made it on a hurry), but if you'd like some, let me know and i'll gladly reserve some time to add it.

https://github.com/Gumemura/Tuxedo_LudumDare47.git

Further more, you will find bellow some links to check the arts used in this game:

https://ansimuz.itch.io/sunny-land-pixel-game-art

https://opengameart.org/content/gentleman-spy-animated

https://opengameart.org/content/skeleton-and-friends-8-directional

https://opengameart.org/content/floating-eyeball-0

Obs.: unfortunately, it wasnt possible to add sound :(
